title: FideFund
description: A blockchain-based charity fundraising mobile app that enhances transparency and donor trust. Donors can browse organizations, track impact reports, and donate using MYR or crypto wallets.

title: GreenStep
description: A mobile app supporting climate action by enabling users to set sustainability goals like carpooling and recycling. Features educational content, climate news, events, and rewards system.

title: Mock WorldFirst
description: A mock mobile application created as a learning exercise to explore iOS app development using Swift and UIKit in Xcode IDE.

title: Spotify Depression Detection System
description: An ML system using random forest algorithm that analyzes Spotify playlists to provide depression possibility predictions based on listening habits.

title: The Battle of Red Cliff
description: A game set against the backdrop of the Battle of Red Cliff, implementing features such as arrow borrowing and maze solving using data structures.
